Injured on 8/6/2014 with a Strained Bicep Tendon, out for 3-4 weeks...
Injured on 7/17/2015 with a Sore Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Earned first career win on 5/25/2019...
Drafted in 1st round, 3rd overall pick, by New York (N) in 1978...
Injured on 7/28/1978 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from New York (N) to Chicago (N) on 1/31/1981 (Going to NYM: P R. Gossage, P R. Jarvis, 1B C. Fisk, 2B S. Braun. Going to CHC: P D. Stieb)...
Injured on 5/21/1982 with a Sore Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/24/1982 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 10 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/1/1983...
Injured on 5/13/1983 with a Blurred Vision Eye, out for 2-3 weeks...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Injured on 6/18/1984 with a Sore Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/21/1984 with a Pulled Tricep Muscle, out for 7 weeks...
Won Gold Glove Award at Pitcher in 1984...
Injured on 7/23/1985 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for full season...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1986, winning 2 games with a 1.06 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/1986, going 4-0, 1.48...
Injured on 7/20/1986 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 4 weeks...
Traded from Chicago (N) to New York (A) on 1/31/1988 (Going to CHC: P B. Smith. Going to NYY: LF M. Young, 3B M. Funderburk, P D. Stieb, P B. Burns, C I. Calderon)...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 2/15/1989 to a 4-year deal worth $9,150,000 per year...
Had first career hit (double) on 10/3/1989, off Jeff Holly (ATL)...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 2/12/1993 to a 2-year deal worth $7,500,000 per year...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/1993, going 7-0, 1.42...
Was selected to the 1993 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 2/4/1995 to a 2-year deal worth $6,000,000 per year...
Drafted in 1st round, 5th overall pick, by St. Louis in 1999...
